metadata.title: CVE-2018-4464 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1.1, tvOS 12.1.1,watchOS 5.1.2, Safari 12.0.2, iTunes 12.9.2 for Windows, iCloud for Windows7.9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4464` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.2-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.22.2-1ubuntu2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
